sourcesContent:
<template>
    <vue-table :data="tableData"></vue-table>
</template>

<script>
import UserManagment from '../services/signUp'
import SubjectManagement from '../services/subjects'


export default {
  data() {
    return {
      tableData: [
        { name: 'John', age: 25 },
        { name: 'Jane', age: 30 }
      ]
    };
  },
  created() {
    const accessToken = this.$route.params.token;
    if (accessToken) {
      this.loadSubjets()
    }
  },
  methods: {
    async loadSubjets(){
        try {

        }catch (error) {
            console.log(error)
        }
    },
    async loadUserData(accessToken) {
        try {
            const userData = await UserManagment.loadUserData(accessToken);

            if (userData.status != 404){
                console.log(userData.data.user_data);
                this.user.name = userData.data.user_data.name;
                this.user.surnames = userData.data.user_data.surnames;
                this.user.username = userData.data.user_data.username;
                
               try {
                    const userSubjects = await SubjectManagement.getUserSubjects(userData.data.user_data.id, userData.data.user_data.role);
                    if(userSubjects.status === 200){
                        this.$router.push(`/`);
                    }
               } catch (error) {
                        this.$router.push(`/choose-subjects`);
               }
            } else {
                console.log('User not found');
                this.$router.push(`/`);
            }
        } catch (error){
            console.log('User not found');
            this.$router.push(`/`);
        }
      }
    }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.main-container {
  max-width: 800px;
  margin: auto;
  padding: 20px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
}

.user-info {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  width: 100%;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.user-avatar {
  width: 70px;
  height: 70px;
  background-color: #ccc;
  border-radius: 50%;
  overflow: hidden;
}

img{
    max-width: 100%;
    height: auto;
}

.user-details {
  flex-grow: 1;
  margin-left: 10px;
}

.user-details h1 {
  margin: 0;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.user-details p {
  margin: 0;
  color: #777;
}

.dropdown {
  position: relative;
}

.dropdown-button {
  background: none;
  border: none;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.dropdown-content {
  position: absolute;
  top: 100%;
  right: 0;
  background-color: #fff;
  box-shadow: 0px 8px 16px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  z-index: 1;
  display: none;
}

.dropdown:hover .dropdown-content {
  display: block;
}

.dropdown-content a {
  color: black;
  padding: 10px;
  text-decoration: none;
  display: block;
  text-align: right;
}

.dropdown-content a:hover {
  background-color: #f1f1f1;
}

.content {
  /* Estilos para el contenido principal de la p√°gina */
}
</style>
